name: TitaniumUnitTesting
description: This will install all the node dependencies to run titanium unit tests

scripts.test: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha app/spec/mochaTests -x app/lib/customCalls/apiCalls.js -x app/lib/customCalls/networkCalls.js -x app/lib/customCalls/parseCalls.js

author: Muhammad Naviwala
